website_summaries.verdict: The fun of Spirograph in a size that fits in the palm of your hand.
pros: Everything fits in the box for convenience on the go
The ring is built into the box
Standard sticky notes can serve as replacement paper
Box snaps closed to hold all gears, paper and pens inside
cons: It can be hard to get the hang of keeping the disks in this set steady while you draw

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Great fun... also for daddy.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old played with this for hours during an 8 hour flight. The paper is sticky at the edge like a post it note and he used it to proudly display his work on the seat back in front of him. This small version was easy enough for a 4 year old leftie with average fine motor skills to get results he was pleased with.
customer_reviews.author: Selma

customer_reviews.title: Still fun after all these years...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for each of my daughters (almost 5 and turning 7) for the older one's birthday, so that they would both have something small to unwrap together. It was an instant hit - the older daughter was very interested in creating the elaborate patterns in the suggestion book, and the younger one enjoyed being "surprised" by the end pattern. It's so fun to see them enjoy something I played with as a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Bell

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like the one I had as a kid!
customer_reviews.text: When I saw the Travel Spirograph, I got a little too excited. It's identical to the one I had as a kid, and my 4 year old loves it - the nice part about the travel version is that you don't have to hold or stick the outer ring to the paper, it's right there for you. The post its it comes with are pretty crappy - I suggest picking up your own sticky note pad before gifting this. Perfect travel or restaurant toy!
customer_reviews.author: Moni M.

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a self-contained set with everything stored inside of the spirograph. I knocked it down one star because it's difficult to open/close and the paper has adhesive on one edge and doesn't tear cleanly. The unit does loosen up with use, making it easier to open and close. So, your kids should be able to use it independently after it has been used for a while. Until then, you'll likely have to help. The paper is about the same size as a standard square Post-It Note. The kit only comes with 25 sheets, so you'll need to add more paper soon. I plan to try replacing with a Post-It pad.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for travel, wedding receptions, restaurants, etc.
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit. Easy for my 4.5 year old to use, and adults and other kids all wanted turns too. I keep it in his bag now, so we can pull it out whereever we are. One tip: depending on where/how you'll be using this at a given time, bring an extra pack of post-it notes (regular size). There are some that come with it, but if you're going to be someplace for a while, or if a lot of kids will want turns, you'll want the extra post-its.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy; very poor quality; unusable and defective
customer_reviews.text: I would rate this product a minus but you don't allow that. It doesn't even work because of the cheap quality of how it was made. The wheels of the spirograph which makes the designs do not fit into the grooves (ring) of the template for it to make the designs. The space between the wheel and the ring is too large. I should have known that this made in china toy would be defective.
customer_reviews.author: Pono the poi dog

customer_reviews.title: Nah
customer_reviews.text: It's junk. Don't know why it has so many good reviews. Too small to really move the inside piece around the circle. The kids can't get the paper inserted by themselves - it is tricky - I have to do it for them. Would not buy again. Just go with the full-sized spirograph.
customer_reviews.author: Gibby

customer_reviews.title: Works with standard square-sized Post-it notes
customer_reviews.text: Hours and hours of fun for kids that like to doodle and draw (and maybe us adults too!). There is some slight shifting that can occur due to the nature of the way the face slides open to access the storage compartment inside. I'm very impressed that the paper size for this unit works with standard square sized Post-it notes! In fact, Post-it notes work better than the paper that comes with the item.
customer_reviews.author: J. English

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable and travels well.
customer_reviews.text: Fun stocking stuffer. I’ve played with it more than my son. But he does like to draw and thinks it’s fun. I wasn’t sure he would like it and I didn’t want to buy the full version for $34. This was a good alternative. Bonus is size and storage compartment makes it easy for travel. Papers that go inside are sticky at one end to stay put. Papers are the 3M super sticky notes if you need to buy more so not hard to find paper refills. I like that.
customer_reviews.author: Boysrulemama

customer_reviews.title: I'm really disappointed that the original Spirograph was redesigned so that it ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm Irving's daughter, reviewing this product. I'm really disappointed that the original Spirograph was redesigned so that it doesn't have its own console that has the large frame that doubles as a cover to contain the rest of the pieces, pens, paper, etc. The travel size is the only one like this, and you can't buy the Spirograph pens separately, without getting some kind of extra gear set.
customer_reviews.author: Irving Drew

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t get this product
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this. The paper doesn’t hold to the back and will move all around while your trying to draw and there is not a good way to even hold it in place. All the stuff fits underneath in the package but it has to be put in just right. Do yourself a favor and just get the flat kind that you use on a tabletop.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A. Faneuf

customer_reviews.title: Cute Little Set
customer_reviews.text: I love that this has so many options for the gears in such a compact package. It comes with paper, gears, two markers (blue and red), and a pamphlet that shows what patterns the gears make. The kids have had a lot of fun with these. The paper size looks to be about the standard post-it note size, which makes getting more paper easy enough. The only complaint I have is that the container is JUST big enough for everything. The kids sometimes have a little issue stuffing everything back together and getting is closed, but it's not a big deal. Overall, great product!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper4

customer_reviews.title: Paper slips
customer_reviews.text: The paper slips depending on how people press so that was not satisfactory. Basically they use post it note paper so that is what I would replace with. When I taped two sides of the paper it worked much better. Can't say that the grandkids were impressed.
customer_reviews.author: kshow1954

customer_reviews.title: Pretty difficult, even for me
customer_reviews.text: Pretty difficult, even for me, to keep it steady on the cheap, thin plastic case. Not sure if I'd recommend. Would be better off getting the full version. This was an introduction to see if son would even be interested. It does come with plenty of discs, a pen, and a good little stack of paper.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: I'd bought white post it notes and coloured pens and the post its fit fine but the pens scratched the Spirograph through the pap
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a car trip with a 4 year old. He had trouble getting the hang of it so I tried, and I also had trouble getting the discs to spin properly and not jump around. I'd bought white post it notes and coloured pens and the post its fit fine but the pens scratched the Spirograph through the paper. Wishing I'd bought him the Spirograph jr. version instead.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Best Nostalgic Gift I've Ever Bought
customer_reviews.text: When I saw this, I had to have it. My sister and I used to play with these on long road trips when we were kids. We each had our own. So for her birthday, I got her and her son one. They love it. So cool to see them playing and loving a creative toy that we also loved as kids.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R

customer_reviews.title: Not a good travel set
customer_reviews.text: We tried to use this for our Christmas driving trip but the paper wouldn't stay in place and the lid wouldn't stay closed. It ended up being a big disappointment because the pattern won't look good if the paper moves around. I wouldn't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Helen F

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It's okay tho it doesn't close properly or all way. Kinda disappointed because got it for my niece kid and myself to do something nice small things together. She gets frustrated bc of that plus that have trouble time get it slide over the paper to use
customer_reviews.author: LJA

customer_reviews.title: 4 and 7 year old granddaughter love!
customer_reviews.text: Took my 4 and 7 year old granddaughters several tries, but they stuck with it. Now they are Spirograph champions and it keeps them entertained for hours! Like other recommended, the 3x3 Post-its fit perfectly. The pens don't last long but pretty much any ballpoint pen works.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P. Sims

customer_reviews.title: Skip this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based off the good reviews but I regret it. Wasted $8 on this; cheaply made and too small to even properly use the different wheels. Better off just buying a regular, full-sized spirograph set.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Winner of a creative tou
customer_reviews.text: Really great for my 6.5 yr old who had difficulty w her older sister's standard set. This main gear is fixed and tall, avoiding loose movements and frustration. Works w standard 3x3 post-it notes for ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wei

customer_reviews.title: Our 3 and 4 year olds love this!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for a recent airplane trip. Our 3- and 4-year olds absolutely loved playing with them. Months later, they still enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: gators

customer_reviews.title: Good start for seeing if the kids will play with spirograph.
customer_reviews.text: good for what it is. The cover is not that easy to keep down, kids may have trouble working it at first. was not impressed with the included pens added my own (no they don't fit inside the case)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brings back memories!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! Brings back memories. A bit difficult at first for a 4 1/2 yr old girl. Still we had fun with it. Maybe better for a bit older child.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I gave this travel size to two daughters who travel. Nice that it uses common sticky note size inside, easy to replace the paper. And paper stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia Siza

customer_reviews.title: Travel ready toy
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine. Smaller version and Can travel. Only problem I had I'd a grandson that wouldn't play with it because it want YouTube connected
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This travel-size spirograph was cheaply made. Before our puppy destroyed it, my daughter had trouble getting it to work. We should have gotten the full size spirograph.
customer_reviews.author: C. Melvin

customer_reviews.title: I have these stored in the van for long drives ...
customer_reviews.text: I have these stored in the van for long drives. The kids get so focused on making new designs that it keeps them busy for most of the ride.
customer_reviews.author: ARA

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Papercrafting and Fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself as a companion to the jumbo set that I already have for paper crafting. The fact that it is the original "adult coloring book" doesn't hurt. There is something very relaxing about drawing the designs. Helps take your mind off of your mind and makes you feel like a kid again.
customer_reviews.author: BethArlington

customer_reviews.title: Box all broken-up
customer_reviews.text: Box is all cracked up. If was for me I wouldn’t care. This was to be a gift to a special needs student. I am too embarrassed to give it to her. I can’t send it back so I guess it will be trashed. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: a1waystreet

customer_reviews.title: My five-year-old daughter keeps and uses this in the car ...
customer_reviews.text: My five-year-old daughter keeps and uses this in the car. The storage design is surprisingly functional and keeps all of the pieces together, addressing my primary concern before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Summery

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price just buy the bigger one....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an extra gift to have on hand incase some little child would show up unexpectedly and I would have something to give them at a party I was throwing but would I buy this as a gift for a child that I would actually know was coming no.. I would have spent the money and got one that had more pieces and you could do something with ....
customer_reviews.author: terry starkey

customer_reviews.title: Fun distraction for long trip
customer_reviews.text: My boys had fun with this. My only complaint is that the adhesive paper that came with it made the paper curl, making it difficult to use properly without my assistance.
customer_reviews.author: MrsA

customer_reviews.title: Neat little item
customer_reviews.text: Neat size and assortment of gears. Regular sized post-it notes fit the frame and make for neat little designs. There are only a couple of markers with it, so I use other markers or colored pens that I own and am happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: SDL

customer_reviews.title: Great travel game
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of grandkids playing iPhone games- pulled this out and they loved it- ask for it every time
customer_reviews.author: R Mize

customer_reviews.title: Not like it used to be
customer_reviews.text: I remember this from when I was little and it certainly performed better than this version. It was a cute stocking stuffer, but the paper barely sticks and the ease of spinning the pieces to make a design is very difficult for a 5 year old. It's just too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great car entertainment for those long rides!
customer_reviews.text: Oh yeah, 6 hour drive with a 6 and 8 year old! They loved this; we used sticky notes and their drawings were stuck all over the back window! I even took a couple of goes at it; fun to see the designs. Great that all the pieces fit inside the sliding top. Definitely a great car entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bowers

customer_reviews.title: This is nice, although I'd prefer a model that can be ...
customer_reviews.text: This is nice, although I'd prefer a model that can be used on regular paper instead of having to use the included pad of tiny paper. I broke the thing apart and use it on our drawing pad, but it was unfortunate that I had to break it to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Chazzkat

customer_reviews.title: Cool memory!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece for her birthday. She spent hours playing with it. Brought back memories for her mom of when she was a kid.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly jaroszewski

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: Nice little toy/time killer. The swivel lid can be a bit of a pain, and the small amount of pre-cut little papers is a bummer but nothing you can't work around.
customer_reviews.author: bdst08

customer_reviews.title: Small container of fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought for use during long travel trip and was not disappointed. Took a minute to get used to the small size but it effectively kept me busy and entertained for quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Glass

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Kind of hard to do holding it like shown in the picture but my daughter likes it. Just not that great for car rides.
customer_reviews.author: UnsinkableMommy

customer_reviews.title: For Mom, not kids
customer_reviews.text: I think I played with this more than either of my 8 year-old twins. I bought this for a 12 hour road trip and neither one of them was interested, but I found it rather fun and nostalgic.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen C

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for my son. I think he will love it. I remember I loved this when I was a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen G.

customer_reviews.title: Really Don't Know
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as an extra gift to a Secret Pal, so really don't know how it worked.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brands

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: It is a piece of junk. The big spirograph works great. The travel size is not usable. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen E. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Nice too keep kids busy while traveling eith using a screen
customer_reviews.text: My seven year old daughter picked this out. She loves little things so this was perfect. My favorite part of the product that the bigger sets can’t do is contain and store the pieces within the product. It is very easy to transport and a nice change from a screen.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: Not easy for a kid to use. Slips around and your designs don’t look as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: rachel P.

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Kid loved it and is great for car rides. Very happy I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: DrDammit

customer_reviews.title: Great item def buy this
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a gift for my Mother (bc as a child i had one and she loved playing with it) when she opened it she almost cried she was so excited (nostalgia) she played with this thing for an hour and a half with out stopping. Its identical to the one i had so awesome
customer_reviews.author: Billy Raley

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Great gift. Small enough to carry easily. Fun and relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: jacsatx

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 5 year old art girl.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. Works as described and easy for kids to use. Reminded me of being a kid. Which is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: I like that it uses post-it notes
customer_reviews.text: My kindergartener loves this! I like that it uses post-it notes, so I son't have to cut paper to a special size. It takes a little practice at first, but it teaches her patience and some fine motor control. We make the design and then embellish it by making it into a flower or coloring individual fields in an interesting pattern.
customer_reviews.author: JDC

customer_reviews.title: Great item for travel
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my grandkids when they travel. Perfect size and they enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: The young artist@
customer_reviews.text: Hand held size game. Take a tablet for extra paper.
customer_reviews.author: nancy michael

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: It’s very small to be used for making patterns. Quality is flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Verified buyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little gift.
customer_reviews.text: Almost too small to use. I watched my granddaughter try to use it but creating anything must take some practice!
customer_reviews.author: Susan McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: This is a great alternative to video games
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alternative to video games. It's compact and the storage box seems to stay secure with jostling (in carry-on bags). The paper is the same size as a standard post it pad so replacement is a snap. You can also use the Spiro graph shapes on larger setups.
customer_reviews.author: Nea

customer_reviews.title: My first grade girl loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's "rainy day bag" at school and she said kids line up to watch her make one and ask for her drawings. She is in first grade! It couldn't be that hard to use. So glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for in the car or at the desk
customer_reviews.text: 4-1/2 year old granddaughter has a blast with this. Perfect for in the car or at the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great item, but beware of OLD sticky notes
customer_reviews.text: Great item, but the sticky notes inside were old and didn’t stick to the surface. It made it difficult for my 7 year old to use the item. I had to use regular tape to attach the paper.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet 21

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: My mom had bought a more complicated & more expensive big set... what a waste. This is PERFECT ! I love that everything fits neatly inside AND you can replace the paper pad with 3x3 post-it notes. Hw brilliant - using post-it notes keeps your paper from sliding around while you work!
customer_reviews.author: K_Gee_

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids had a blast with this until they lost the peices
customer_reviews.author: MeDon

customer_reviews.title: This is a great idea, I love the size - perfect for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is flimsy. The pieces don't fit together well, making the wheels not work correctly. This is a great idea, I love the size - perfect for travel and the case holds all the accessories. Just cheaply made. I would recommend a full size spirograph.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My four year old sons favorite travel toy. Both my boys love it. Small, lightweight and entertains my kids for 30-60 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: L. Goff

customer_reviews.title: Great Creative Toy
customer_reviews.text: Got this to entertain my 5 year on a road trip and she loves it! It comes with a small amount of paper, but postage note size seems to work well as replacements. Shipped very quickly with standard shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great quiet toy that inspires imagination
customer_reviews.text: My ten-year-old daughter keeps this in her purse and plays with it in church.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun travel toy. Fits in my purse for entertainment running errands. Comes with a sticky note pad so the paper stays in place, and my son can hang his art work :)
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for a 5 year old! Took on our trip and kept kids very happy and entertained!
customer_reviews.author: MBW

customer_reviews.title: Great stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old LOVES this timeless toy. She loves it so much she takes it everywhere. It entertains her during dinners at a restaurant, during car rides, and hours at home. So much better than plugging her into something!
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Compact and artistic!
customer_reviews.text: My children had so much fun with this on our recent road trip! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RLB

customer_reviews.title: Love the easy to use travel case
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift . Love the easy to use travel case. Great for children who are always on the go with there parents. Easy to carry and use while waiting for the food to show up while out to dinner with the family.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: My daughter got this in stocking and took it on ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this in stocking and took it on our little trip for the holidays. It kept her entertained for part of the trip. Wished it came with more than two colors of pens but she can always use some of her other pens.
customer_reviews.author: shell

customer_reviews.title: This works spirograph really well. Both my 4 year ...
customer_reviews.text: This works spirograph really well. Both my 4 year old and my 7 year old played with it a LOT on our long car ride. Everything fits in the little red case--the pens, the paper and the disks.
customer_reviews.author: pal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nostalgia toy
customer_reviews.text: This is just like the one I had as a kid! I love it and keep it in my desk drawer
customer_reviews.author: redheaddebate

customer_reviews.title: This is such a cool little toy
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cool little toy! I loved that everything stays inside the body of the base itself...makes it much easier when traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these and the back seat is quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Reid

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item and arrived on time! Perfect for boys and girls of all ages! AND.... NO BATTERIES!!! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as I remember from when I was a child. My kids now love this product too.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great " on the go"  design studio!
customer_reviews.text: Everything the designer needs right in a compact case!!! This even has a red and blue pen included! Notes also give specific "how to " directions for specific designs! Design wheels are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Kozak

customer_reviews.title: Car/dinner toy
customer_reviews.text: Get to enjoy watching the kids at the table while out to dinner. They like to show all their cool art.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie McEndree

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: Was fun to introduce my 4 year old to , and brought back lots of childhood memories for me.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is. Just know that it is portable- but its a small, inexpensive toy with few options in templates or colors. It was a gift so I don't know if it was liked or not by the recipient.
customer_reviews.author: H. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for Christmas gifts and they were a hit! The adults even wanted to play with them!
customer_reviews.author: MaryElisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Travel Doodlers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nieces as a travel activity. They loved it as did all of us adults.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie M

customer_reviews.title: Portable and engaging
customer_reviews.text: Easy to travel with and convenient to occupy my child’s attention at age 5
customer_reviews.author: dina

customer_reviews.title: Such fun!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this! It's the perfect size for travel or an amusement on my office desk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kept kids quiet on place ride and they played with ...
customer_reviews.text: Kept kids quiet on place ride and they played with it for hours. It is compact enough to carry in purse for when I need them to be distracted. I was surprised our 5 year old was so captivated by it.
customer_reviews.author: Rul Springer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I truthfully was not impressed with this product. I know it was cheap but the paper didn’t even stay in place to use. I would not recommend and would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Destinee

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My 9 years old daughter like it so much but she couldn’t use it for long time bc the paper’s runs out!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea, but it requires some practice to really ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice idea, but it requires some practice to really draw something wonderful. We hoped to use it as a toy while our transatlantic flight, but it didn't work out that well, for without good posture and grip you can't really draw nice stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Irina Benke

customer_reviews.title: relaxing and creative...
customer_reviews.text: kids are enjoying a toy from our past and present.... simple, creative and relaxing...
customer_reviews.author: Geri L

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but not nearly as impressive as I'd hoped ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but not nearly as impressive as I'd hoped for the price & not enough "accessories." This will not keep the attention of most children longer than 10 minutes or so.
customer_reviews.author: smurrffydoll

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Purchased for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Purchased for my daughter. It is exactly like the one I had as a child. Great fun especially for long car rides.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Good for a child who is traveling somewhere
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a child to use on a plane trip and at home. Child seemed to enjoy the toy.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: Not particularly travel friendly
customer_reviews.text: This isn't very travel adapted. Just get a regular Spirograph or Spirograph Junior.
customer_reviews.author: melissa butler

customer_reviews.title: Small and easy to pack!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to entertain my grandkids at the beach. They had the larger size spirographs at home, so this was a special treat.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.text: So much fun for my boys age 7 and 8 for a 12 hour flight! They love it!

product_meta.title: Spirograph Travel Set, Model Number: 01020
product_meta.description: Now you can create countless amazing designs on the go with the classic Travel Spirograph Playset! This portable Spirograph studio has a built-in design ring, work surface and storage compartment for holding wheels, pens, paper, design guide and finished artwork. The Kahootz Travel Spirograph Playset is the perfect “go-anywhere” design toy! Includes instruction / design guide. For ages 5 and up.
